Articles.Content: Are there any Multiplayer games that have decent graphics that are for space exploration/colonization. KSP is giving me to many problems.

Planetbase, and Sol 0 Mars colonization are the only ones I know of, but you won't be able to design/build rockets, and I don't think they're multiplayer.

 

In other words, I don't think there's any other game like KSP, KSP is one of a kind.

Edited April 29, 2016 by Spaceception

Starmade and space engineer are the two games I imagine will fit some of your criteria. No fancy graphics though.

But they're more similar to mine craft in space than ksp.

Edited April 29, 2016 by RainDreamer
Uh, Eve Online?  (OK, more like space battles and trading).
You could try Darkmultiplayer for KSP.  I believe it is only updated for 1.05 and has a few issues.
Take on Mars has a multiplayer base building part, but the development team takes its time finishing it, they have some other game going that has priority for them for business reasons it seems.
